item1:
翻译字典维护
Maintenance of translation dictionary
item2:
由管理者依据使用语言设定程序显示字段
The manager sets the program display fields according to the language used
item5:
字段显示内容
Field display content
item6:
字段显示翻译档
Field display translation dictionary
item7:
如果因为网路中断产生的异常，须结束WES软件，请网路管理人员恢复网路后再重启WES
If the WES software needs to be terminated due to an abnormality caused by a network interruption, ask the network administrator to restore the network and restart WES
item8:
1. 输入查询条件后点选Query查询字段显示文字
Enter query conditions and click Query to query field display text
